description: The Douglas A-1H Skyraider is an attack aircraft, It is propeller-driven, has a single engine, and is carrier-capable. It was developed from the AD-5, but returned to the fuselage and single-pilot cockpit configuration of the AD-4. Prior to 1962, it was designated AD-6.
notes: From 1967, rocket extraction device gives -1 modifier when bailing out.
